LanguageData.PPC.label: PPC
LanguageData.PPC.description: The RA-P3 Pulsed Power Capacitor, stores a large amounts of energy in a bank of ultra capacitors, which can be discharged in a single pulse by compatible Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.PPC_Blueprint.label: PPC (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPC_Frame.label: PPC (building)
LanguageData.PPC_Frame.description: The RA-P3 Pulsed Power Capacitor, stores a large amounts of energy in a bank of ultra capacitors, which can be discharged in a single pulse by compatible Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.label: SACS
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.description: The RA-c85 Semi Automated Command Station, is required by all Rimatomics energy weapons, may require manning for certain weapons to function fully.
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Blueprint.label: SACS (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Frame.label: SACS (building)
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Frame.description: The RA-c85 Semi Automated Command Station, is required by all Rimatomics energy weapons, may require manning for certain weapons to function fully.
LanguageData.RadarDish.label: TACS
LanguageData.RadarDish.description: The RA-92 Target Acquisition and Communication System, uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets and communicate with weapon systems.
LanguageData.RadarDish_Blueprint.label: TACS (blueprint)
LanguageData.RadarDish_Frame.label: TACS (building)
LanguageData.RadarDish_Frame.description: The RA-92 Target Acquisition and Communication System, uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets and communicate with weapon systems.
LanguageData.PPCADS.label: ADS
LanguageData.PPCADS.description: The RA-22 Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon designed for area denial, perimeter security and crowd control. It heats the surface of targets, such as the skin of targeted human subjects, this causes them to break rank and flee. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.PPCADS_Blueprint.label: ADS (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCADS_Frame.label: ADS (building)
LanguageData.PPCADS_Frame.description: The RA-22 Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon designed for area denial, perimeter security and crowd control. It heats the surface of targets, such as the skin of targeted human subjects, this causes them to break rank and flee. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.ADS_Dish.label: ADS Dish
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.label: Tesla Coil
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.description: The RA-42T Tesla Coil Delivers a huge electrical arc discharge to its targets resulting in severe burns or death. 100% accurate, medium range, sets targets on fire. Automatic targeting and firing with a TACS. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Blueprint.label: Tesla Coil (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Frame.label: Tesla Coil (building)
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Frame.description: The RA-42T Tesla Coil Delivers a huge electrical arc discharge to its targets resulting in severe burns or death. 100% accurate, medium range, sets targets on fire. Automatic targeting and firing with a TACS. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.Tesla_Coil_Arc_Discharger.label: Tesla Coil Arc Discharger
LanguageData.PPCHEL.label: HEL
LanguageData.PPCHEL.description: The RA-702 High Energy Laser (HEL) destroys enemy airborne projectiles such as mortar shells. When a mortar is fired the system will check if the shell will pass through the range of a HEL, if the trajectory through the radius is long enough for a shoot down attempt then a HEL will track the target and fire once it's in range. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Blueprint.label: HEL (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Frame.label: HEL (building)
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Frame.description: The RA-702 High Energy Laser (HEL) destroys enemy airborne projectiles such as mortar shells. When a mortar is fired the system will check if the shell will pass through the range of a HEL, if the trajectory through the radius is long enough for a shoot down attempt then a HEL will track the target and fire once it's in range. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.HEL_Laser.label: HEL Laser
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.label: Punisher
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.description: The RA-1802D Punisher is a 25 round magazine fed railgun platform which uses large electromagnetic pulses to launch sabot projectiles to extreme velocities and ranges. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Blueprint.label: Punisher (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Frame.label: Punisher (building)
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Frame.description: The RA-1802D Punisher is a 25 round magazine fed railgun platform which uses large electromagnetic pulses to launch sabot projectiles to extreme velocities and ranges. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.Railgun_Cannon.label: Punisher Railgun
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.label: Obelisk
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.description: The RA-2152-X Obelisk is a directed energy weapon that uses a focused solid state laser to vaporize targets. 100% accurate with long range and devastating power, but with large pulse size and long cooldown. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Blueprint.label: Obelisk (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Frame.label: Obelisk (building)
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Frame.description: The RA-2152-X Obelisk is a directed energy weapon that uses a focused solid state laser to vaporize targets. 100% accurate with long range and devastating power, but with large pulse size and long cooldown. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Works with unmanned SACS
LanguageData.Obelisk_Laser.label: Obelisk Laser
LanguageData.PPCMarauder.label: Marauder
LanguageData.PPCMarauder.description: The RA-3b Marauder is a multi-barrel coaxial plasma railgun platform, which uses large electromagnetic pulses to fire a burst of accelerated plasma toroids to extreme velocities causing explosive radiation emitting impacts. Manned SACS required with manual targeting only. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.PPCMarauder_Blueprint.label: Marauder (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCMarauder_Frame.label: Marauder (building)
LanguageData.PPCMarauder_Frame.description: The RA-3b Marauder is a multi-barrel coaxial plasma railgun platform, which uses large electromagnetic pulses to fire a burst of accelerated plasma toroids to extreme velocities causing explosive radiation emitting impacts. Manned SACS required with manual targeting only. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.Marauder_Railgun.label: Marauder Railgun
LanguageData.Bullet_PlasmaToroid.label: Plasma Toroid
LanguageData.MissileSilo.label: Liberator
LanguageData.MissileSilo.description: The RA-1776b Liberator is a self contained all-in-one ICBM manufacturing and launching facility with a 5 missile magazine capacity. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.MissileSilo_Blueprint.label: Liberator (blueprint)
LanguageData.MissileSilo_Frame.label: Liberator (building)
LanguageData.MissileSilo_Frame.description: The RA-1776b Liberator is a self contained all-in-one ICBM manufacturing and launching facility with a 5 missile magazine capacity. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.notReal.label: notReal
